instructions.content: Implement data privacy by design. Collect minimal necessary data, provide clear privacy notices, enable user consent management, and support data subject rights (access, rectification, deletion, portability).

Implement comprehensive audit logging for all sensitive operations. Log user actions, data access, configuration changes, and security events. Ensure logs are tamper-proof and retained per compliance requirements.
Maintain documentation required for regulatory compliance (SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, PCI DSS). Document security controls, data flows, risk assessments, and incident response procedures.
Implement role-based access control (RBAC) with principle of least privilege. Regular access reviews, automated provisioning/deprovisioning, and segregation of duties for sensitive operations.
